programme.title: Can't Buy Me Love
programme.desc: The third daughter, Princess Chiu Yeung, of the Tang Emperor, is known throughout the kingdom for her beauty, but she is also known for her unreasonable and stubborn personality. programme.title: Binibining Marikit
programme.desc: This is the story of Marikit, or Ikit, a hardworking and cheerful Dumagat Remontado tour guide. Raised by her father Gani after being abandoned by her mother Mayumi, Ikit grows up believing that her mother left them for ambition. Their lives take a turn when Rica, a widow, and her daughter Angela arrive in Daraitan, scheming to buy Dumagat lands for a development project.

programme.desc: It tells the story of four underprivileged boys -- Kidlat, Kulot, Sig, and Dags -- who were detained in a juvenile center as a punishment for a crime they did not commit. programme.title: Lolong: Bayani ng Bayan

programme.title: Mga Batang Riles
programme.desc: It tells the story of four underprivileged boys -- Kidlat, Kulot, Sig, and Dags -- who were detained in a juvenile center as a punishment for a crime they did not commit. In the juvenile center, they must fight the odds, survive, and get out to find the real culprit, clear their names, and save their impoverished neighborhood from corruption and abuse.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

Operation Break the Casanova's Heart ep 11
programme.desc: After Stephen, the school's casanova, breaks the heart of Naomi's bestfriend, Kryzel, Naomi becomes determined to seek revenge. In her effort to do so, she is discovered by the HSCC (Haters of Stephen Cruz Coalition), a secret group composed of Stephen's ex-girlfriends who seek revenge on Stephen and recruits her on their mission guided by 10 steps to break the casanova's heart.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 2
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 3
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 18
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 9
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 2
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas.

programme.title: Operation Break the Casanova's Heart ep 12
programme.desc: After Stephen, the school's casanova, breaks the heart of Naomi's bestfriend, Kryzel, Naomi becomes determined to seek revenge. programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 4
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 5
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 9
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 2
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Tayong Dalawa
programme.desc: Carol, a woman with goals to gain respect in the male-dominated corporate world, meets a carefree technician who changes her perspective on life.

programme.title: Encounter ep 16
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 2
programme.desc:

bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the

programme.title: Kalye Kweens ep 10
programme.desc:
Mandy and Telly are former best friends who are now the leaders of 
neighboring communities that have been perennially in conflict. Their 
game of one-upmanship worsens when both their sons become best 
friends but are smitten with the same girl.

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 9
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.desc:

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 2
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas.

programme.title: The Kasambahays S2 ep 14
programme.desc: Guia (Donnalyn Bartolome) transfers to a different neighborhood, meets new faces. New kasambahays, new masters and a whole new adventure packed with fun and laughter.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Maria Makiling ep 3
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Sing Galing Season 3 Ep 13
programme.desc: Sing Galing is a Philippine videoke singing reality game show. The contestants must know the right lyrics to any randomly chosen song, be it Filipino or foreign, without going out of tune. If the contestant fails to sing the right lyrics and in tune, an animated genie would pop up on the screen and strike an animated gong to signal the end of the unfortunate aspirant's chance at instant wealth and

programme.title: Masked Singer S3 ep 3 Part 1
programme.desc: New Season, new masked singers, exciting twists and triple the fun on the third season of Masked Singer Pilipinas.

programme.title: Magdaleno Orbos: Sa Kuko Ng Mga Lawin
Crocodile Jones Son Of Indiana Dundee
Tunay Na Tunay (Gets Mo, Gets Ko)
Walang Matigas Na Pulis Sa Matinik Na Misis
April Boys Sana'y Mahalin Mo Rin Ako
Kung Aagawin Mo Ang Lahat Sa Akin
IUKIT MO SA BALA BONG REVILLA
MOMSHIES! ANG SOUL MOY AKIN! JOLINA MAGDANGAL
LT. PALAGAWAD MAGUUNAHAN ANG PAA MO SA HUKAY CHUCK PEREZ
Ang Utol Kong Hoodlum (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Behind his bad boy image, Ben (Robin Padilla) has a big heart. The modern day Robinhood collects grease money from jeepney drivers in behalf of the syndicate. He then gets a meager amount in return which he uses to feed his adoptive parents whom he loves dearly.

programme.title: Walang Matigas Na Pulis Sa Matinik Na Misis
programme.desc: Admired for his good looks and his popularity with the ladies, most people would call Bart (Bong Revilla Jr). But if there's one thing that grounds Bart, that's his fear of his wife.

programme.title: Ngayon at Kailanman
programme.desc: Ayra (Sharon Cuneta), an heiress who came home to bury her dead father and who later discovered that her family's estate had been taken over by Edwin (Richard Gomez), her childhood sweetheart and the son of their former overseer.

programme.title: Darna, Ang Pagbabalik (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: While trying to find her grandmother and little brother, Ding, Narda is viciously struck in the head and the stone that furnishes her power is stolen. Before the inevitable face-off with Valentina, Darna gains a new ally when she helps police lieutenant Max Ablan.

programme.title: TGIS, The Movie
programme.desc: The top-rating TV show about teen-age life came to the screen in this adventure film where the TGIS kids learned the value of friendship.

programme.title: Gayuma
programme.desc: This story is about an adult contemporary Filipino film that tackled the subject of paganism and black magic in the sex culture of Filipinos.

programme.title: Sa Totoo Lang
programme.desc: Some of the country's finest actors joined the fun in this witty and totally hilarious look into the sex lives of lower middle class women who were old and single or separated, widowed, grass widowed, fooling around and everything else you could think of plus the assortment of men they met, fell for, cheated on, disliked, feared or anything else.

programme.title: Alex Boncayao Brigade
programme.desc: New People's Army comrade Ka Romy (Ronnie Ricketts) is assigned by higher command to form an elite hit team to operate in the city. Their group is called the Alex Boncayao Brigade. Meanwhile, the military also mounts an operation to capture the brigade. When will both sides realize that in war, there can be no winners and losers.

programme.title: Sana Dalawa Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: A young man who was engaged to be married found himself attracted to another woman. Lacking the nerve to call off the wedding, he went through with the ceremony hopeful that his bride would give him the strength to avoid his other love.

programme.title: Oplan Baleleng
programme.desc: Oplan Baleleng was the name given to a paramilitary group made up of hardened convicts tasked with the rescue of kidnap for ransom victims. In truth though, theirs was a murder mission.

programme.title: Mauna Ka... Susunod Ako!
programme.desc: When Gerry's father Eric dies in the hands of criminal elements, he goes to his father's bestfriend Arthur for guidance.

programme.title: April Boys: Sana'y Mahalin Mo Rin Ako
programme.desc: Popular singing duo Vingo and Jimmy, collectively known as the April Boys, brought the real life tale of their climb to fame to the big screen.

programme.title: Bakit May Kahapon Pa?
programme.desc: Award-winning actress Nora Aunor turned in one of her finest performances as Helen, a survivor.

programme.title: Kung Aagawin Mo Ang Lahat Sa Akin
programme.desc: An intense rivalry has always existed between Jackie Lou and her older sister, Sharon, whom her parents had adopted before she was born. Their father believed the girls should be treated as equals but their mother, thought otherwise.

programme.title: Dugong Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Father and son were unknowingly pitted against each other in this tale of a man determined to hate his enemy all his life and who, one day, would exact revenge in the most cruel manner even if it took him years and years of plotting and waiting.
